text:
Food
- As usual, it is best to eat freshly made pizza right away and not delivered. Love the pizza at pizza hut, has more toppings and cheese than other brands. Order 2 regular (cheaper in 2s) for 4 pax (2A2C).

Service
- Lady on duty is very friendly and patient.

Atmosphere
- Clean, small, but cozy.

Worth to revisit again?
- YES

A quick process from ordering to collection, of course have to wait for the pizza which i can go around the mall to run errands first.
Staffs are friendly.

One thing about the atmosphere inside, I know pizzahut known for their stuffed pizza.
its bit stuffy and warm. The ac is not felt to have a comfortable dining in experience.

Anyway, you cant go wrong with pizzahut!.
Cheers to that.

Had a great experience at Pizza Hut! The service was a-okay! and the staff were really friendly and accommodating. The food was delicious especially the pan pizza, which was perfectly cooked and loaded with toppings. The atmosphere was clean, cozy, and family-friendly, making it a comfortable place to enjoy a meal. Definitely coming back again soon!

Food was good! Hot, perfectly cheesy, and satisfying. Service was great too, especially since it was close to closing time I was worried that I would be imposing, but Emman was extremely accommodating and provided excellent service. Will definitely come back again.
Pizza was delicious, loved the chicken supreme! It was hot and even the crust was crispy. Waiting time was also ok, collected my order in 15 minutes. Staff is courteous too.
